title: 6 bans is not enough.
body:
I cannot ban all the cancer champs with 3 bans.

Fiora
Irelia
Darius
Garen
Vayne
Braum
Leona
Xerath
Annie
Riven
Renekton
Nasus
Heimerdinger
Quinn
Sona
Lee Sin
Zed
Kayle
Morgana
Trynadamere
Trundle

Too many cancer champions.

replies.body:
These Champions aren't even that bad
Nasus
Heimerdinger
Quinn
Sona
Lee Sin
Zed
Kayle
Morgana
Trynadamere
Trundle
Irelia

and you missed 1 vital one:
Mordekaiser.
That feel when Yasuo isn't in the list :(
